languages.text: Рядом с пылающим механизмом ощутимо тянет прометиумом — машины облили горючей жидкостью и подожгли.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Горящая техника. Судя по всему, подожжена нарочно, чтобы создавать больше света.

languages.text: The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.
languages.original_text: Рядом с пылающим механизмом ощутимо тянет прометиумом — машины облили горючей жидкостью и подожгли.

traits.locale_text: The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.
The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.
The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.
The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.

languages.text: 机器熊熊燃烧，周围的空气弥漫着浓烈的钷素味。这些机器先是被浇上了助燃剂，之后被点燃了。
languages.original_text: The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.

traits.locale_text: 机器熊熊燃烧，周围的空气弥漫着浓烈的钷素味。这些机器先是被浇上了助燃剂，之后被点燃了。

languages.text: El potente olor del prometio impregna el aire alrededor del mecanismo ardiente. Parece evidente que alguien vertió el combustible sobre las máquinas antes de prenderles fuego.
languages.original_text: The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.

traits.locale_text: El potente olor del prometio impregna el aire alrededor del mecanismo ardiente. Parece evidente que alguien vertió el combustible sobre las máquinas antes de prenderles fuego.

languages.text: プロメチウムの強力な匂いが燃焼機構の周囲に漂っている。機械に促進剤が注入され、点火された。
languages.original_text: The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.

traits.locale_text: プロメチウムの強力な匂いが燃焼機構の周囲に漂っている。機械に促進剤が注入され、点火された。

languages.text: L'odeur puissante du prométhium emplit l'air autour du mécanisme pris dans les flammes. Les machines ont été aspergées de ce liquide inflammable et incendiées.
languages.original_text: The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.

traits.locale_text: L'odeur puissante du prométhium emplit l'air autour du mécanisme pris dans les flammes. Les machines ont été aspergées de ce liquide inflammable et incendiées.

languages.text: Der durchdringende Geruch von Promethium liegt in der Luft um den brennenden Mechanismus – die Maschinen wurden mit dem Brandbeschleuniger übergossen und dann angezündet.
languages.original_text: The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.

traits.locale_text: Der durchdringende Geruch von Promethium liegt in der Luft um den brennenden Mechanismus – die Maschinen wurden mit dem Brandbeschleuniger übergossen und dann angezündet.

languages.text: Yanan mekanizmanın çevresine güçlü bir prometyum kokusu hâkim. Makineler hızlandırıcıyla ıslatılmış, ardından ateşe verilmişler.
languages.original_text: The powerful smell of promethium lingers in the air around the burning mechanism — the machines were doused with the accelerant and set alight.

traits.locale_text: Yanan mekanizmanın etrafında güçlü bir prometyum kokusu hâkim. Makineler hızlandırıcıyla ıslatılmış ve ateşe verilmiş.
